name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Thunderstorm Bow
description: A legendary bow that harnesses the power of thunderstorms.
looks: The Thunderstorm Bow has a sleek design with a bowstring crackling with electricity. The limbs of the bow are made of polished silver, engraved with ancient symbols of power.

special_weapon_skills.Archery: Increases accuracy and damage with bows.

special_effects.Thunderstorm: 30% chance to unleash a powerful lightning bolt upon hitting a target.

name: Ring of Strength
description: A powerful ring that enhances the wearer's strength.
looks: The ring is made of solid gold and has a large gemstone embedded in the center. The gemstone has a fiery red color.

special_effects.strength_enhancement: Increases the damage of physical attacks.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that can be used to heal wounds and cure ailments.
looks: The staff is made of polished white oak and is adorned with small crystals that emit a warm light. It has intricate carvings of healing symbols along its length.

name: Ancient Bow
description: A powerful bow crafted by ancient elven craftsmen.
looks: The bow is made of shimmering silver wood, adorned with intricate engravings of elven symbols. It is adorned with a string made of golden thread.

special_effects.critical_strike: Allows for a higher chance of landing critical hits.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that possesses the power to heal and restore.
looks: The staff is made of polished maple wood, adorned with golden engravings. It has a crystal at the top that glows with a soothing light.

special_effects.healing_touch: Allows the user to cast healing spells more effectively.

name: Dagger of Shadows
description: A sinister dagger that exudes an aura of darkness.
looks: The Dagger of Shadows has a slender, black blade that seems to absorb light. The hilt is wrapped in dark leather with an intricate design of swirling shadows.

special_effects.shadow_strike: Allows the wielder to disappear into the shadows and strike from stealth.
